name: Arganese - Connecticut - Churchill
additionalNotes: Arganese cigars are made in Nicaragua with a premium blend of tobaccos from Nicaragua, Indonesia and the Dominican Republic. The results are mellow, smooth and naturally creamy cigars that make great everyday smokes. And at these great prices, feel free to share with your friends and family. Arganese Connecticut utilizes a mellow, well-aged long-filler blend underneath a seamless Connecticut shade wrapper. Smooth and creamy throughout with a backing core of crisp, toasty tobacco flavors.
